translation.en: [little girl] No.
-[little girl babbling] -[man speaking German]
I'm Lieutenant Dalton. I'm Lieutenant Dalton.
translation.it: Tenente Dalton. Sono il Tenente Dalton.

translation.en: Lieutenant Dalton.
-[man] Herr Werner? -Yes.
I'm Lieutenant Dalton, up from Viden.
translation.it: Sono il Tenente Dalton, da Weiden.

translation.en: We've found a few inconsistencies in our records from your time with us
translation.it: Abbiamo riscontrato incongruenze nella sua testimonianza

translation.en: and we'd appreciate your help clarifying them.
-Thank you so much. -[Werner] Mm-hmm.
Please.
[woman] What do you want from us?
-It's all right. -He didn't do anything to you.
translation.it: - Calma. - Non vi ha fatto niente.

translation.en: He was a medic.
I don't know what stories he's been telling you,
translation.it: Non so cosa le ha raccontato,

translation.en: but we know who he is, Vera.
translation.it: Non so cosa le ha raccontato, ma sappiamo chi è, Vera.

translation.en: My name is Annie.
No, your sons Klaus and the other boy, Dieter, they...
translation.it: No, i suoi figli, Klaus e l'altro maschietto, Dieter...

translation.en: -[Annie screams] -Shit! Shit! Moshe!
[Dalton] It's the wrong guy. It's not even him!
[Moshe] So, what?
He was a Nazi.
I bet he was on someone's list.
[Moshe] You gonna give us a hand or what? Come on.
translation.it: Ce la dai una mano? E dai.

translation.en: [man 2] I remember reading years ago
some Austrian they mistook for me.
translation.it: che scambiarono un austriaco per me.

translation.en: I have the article framed at home.
I hope that future historians
translation.it: Spero che gli storici del futuro

translation.en: will not be tempted to stray from the truth as we record it here today.
translation.it: non saranno tentati di scostarsi dalla verità così come la racconteremo oggi.

translation.en: I could talk of what I saw
translation.it: Potrei narrare quel che ho visto

translation.en: at the pits, in Minsk.
Or the vans at Chelmno,
but these were the deeds and demands of others.
translation.it: ma questi atti furono decisi da altri.

translation.en: I issued no such orders.
Our work was paperwork,
translation.it: Il nostro era semplice lavoro di ufficio,

translation.en: our war a numerical one.
And though I struggled against endless idiocy,
translation.it: E anche se ebbi a che fare con molta stupidità,

translation.en: I only did what little I could in Germany's fight against her enemies.
translation.it: il mio ruolo contro i nemici della Germania fu di poco conto.

translation.en: [woman] You said you wanted to take a job in Jersey.
translation.it: Mi hai detto che andavi a lavorare nel Jersey.

translation.en: Couldn't we run away? I'd do anything to be with you. Anything!
translation.it: Perché non scappiamo? Farei qualunque cosa per te. Qualunque!

translation.en: That's not a bad idea.
That's not a bad idea at all.
-Just tell me one thing. -Yes.
Is it true?
Is what true?
Is your mother a nigger?
[man] Tell me.
-[man shouting] Tell me! -[woman] What difference does it make?
-You love me. -All the kids talking behind my back.
translation.it: - Tu mi ami. - Mi parlano tutti dietro.

translation.en: -[man] Is it true? Are you black? -[woman] No! [woman] No, I'm as white as you.
translation.it: - È vero? Sei nera? - No, sono bianca come te.

translation.en: -[man] You're lying. -[woman] I'm not!
-[man] You're lying. You are! -[woman] I'm not! I'm not!
-[shushes] -[scoffs and chuckles]
-[man] So, you're German too? -[woman] Well, my father is.
translation.it: Anche lei è tedesca? Mio padre lo è.

translation.en: I'd love to meet him sometime. Can I see you again?
Father made us learn 100 Spanish words a day.
translation.it: Papà ci faceva imparare 100 parole in spagnolo al giorno.

translation.en: -One hundred. -No more, no less. I was...
translation.it: - Cento! - Non una di più, non una di meno. Io...

translation.en: I was terrible.
I just wanted to ride horses and explore Tucumán.
translation.it: Volevo solo andare a cavallo ed esplorare i dintorni di Tuckerman.

translation.en: What part of the Fatherland are you from?
translation.it: Di che parte della Germania è?

translation.en: [man] We moved all over during the war.
translation.it: Durante la guerra ci siamo spostati molto.

translation.en: Oh, so your father, he was in the army?
SS, actually.
But he was killed in the East.
Oh, I thought, I thought...
[man] We live with my uncle now, Ricardo. He's, uh...
translation.it: Ora stiamo con mio zio, Ricardo.

translation.en: He's like a father to us.
translation.it: È come un padre, per noi.

translation.en: [woman] I'm so sorry, Klaus.
That's awful.
Do you ever think about going back?
[Klaus] To Germany?
Um, I don't know.
I'm told things.
What things?
Oh, the Jews, clawing power back,
taking jobs, corrupting everything, like before.
translation.it: Rubano il lavoro, corrompono. Come prima.

translation.en: But, of course, there are plenty of them here too so...
translation.it: Ma ce ne sono molti anche qui, per cui...

translation.en: My uncle says they pop up everywhere, like mushrooms after rain.
translation.it: Mio zio dice che spuntano dappertutto, come funghi dopo la pioggia.

translation.en: -Mushrooms. -[Klaus chuckles]
-[laughing] Mushrooms. -[woman laughs out loud]
A toast.
To your father.
A hero, I'm sure.
Tell me, would I recognize his name?
translation.it: Mi dica. Aveva un nome famoso?

translation.en: [man 1] Mr. Harel.
Mr. Harel. Just five minutes.
[man 2] Herr Harel, please. Sir, this is Herr Fritz Bauer,
translation.it: Herr Harel, prego. Signore, lui è Herr Fritz Bauer,

translation.en: he's the District Attorney of Hessen in West Germany.
translation.it: Procuratore Distrettuale di Hessen, Germania Ovest.

translation.en: He says he's found someone.
[Herr Fritz Bauer] I have a lead on a great enemy of our people.
translation.it: Ho indizi su un nostro grande nemico.

translation.en: I don't have time for this. Rafi, take care of it, okay?
translation.it: Non ho tempo. Rafi, se ne occupi lei.

translation.en: [Herr Fritz Bauer] Adolf Eichmann is not just some pencil pusher.
translation.it: Adolf Eichmann non è uno qualunque.

translation.en: This man deserves to be punished.
[Harel] You have the word of a blind man.
translation.it: Abbiamo la parola di un cieco.

translation.en: [Bauer] He doesn't need his eyes to hear the boy's name. Klaus Eichmann.
translation.it: Non serve la vista per sentire il nome del ragazzo, Klaus Eichmann.

translation.en: [Harel] Why would this girl, Sylvia, date a Nazi's son?
translation.it: E perché questa Sylvia uscirebbe con il figlio di un nazista?

translation.en: Hermann spent time in Dachau;
he decided to raise Sylvia Catholic.
[Rafi] She didn't know she was Jewish?
Has he broken the bad news to her yet?
[Bauer chuckles] Yeah. She insists on seeing him still.
translation.it: Sì, ma lei ha continuato a uscirci.

translation.en: Says she's a good Catholic and the boy is, too.
translation.it: Dice che entrambi sono buoni cattolici.

translation.en: [Harel] Okay. Thank you.
Listen, I really appreciate your coming,
but you have to understand. I got Egypt wreaking havoc,
translation.it: ma deve capire. Gli egiziani stanno facendo un casino

translation.en: the Fedayeen. Hikers getting killed at Masada.
translation.it: i Fedayìn. Turisti massacrati a Masada.

translation.en: Our resources are limited.
I can't waste them chasing rumors. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Non posso star dietro alle voci. Mi spiace.

translation.en: Think what it means.
Jews finally, publicly, holding to account the man who organized our slaughter.
translation.it: Finalmente riusciremmo a prendere l'uomo che organizzò lo sterminio.

translation.en: Organized. Past tense.
It is my job, Herr Bauer,
to focus on those who are planning it today.
Thank you very much for coming.
-Please-- -[Harel] Thank you very much.
Just give me one second.
Sir?
Let's say he's right.
Can you imagine the headache when he tells the world
translation.it: Si immagina la figura quando il mondo saprà

translation.en: that we wouldn't waste our resources on the architect of the Final Solution?
translation.it: che non abbiamo impiegato risorse per l'architetto della soluzione finale?

translation.en: Slowly.
What are you...?
Shall we just stand here?
You're waving at my crotch in a weird way.
Just get in there. Don't be afraid.
I'm not afraid, we're focusing on technique.
translation.it: Non ho paura, provo la tecnica.

translation.en: Okay, well technically, do it better.
You know why they throw all the shittiest jobs at you, right?
translation.it: Sai perché ti danno solo lavori di merda?

translation.en: I don't know, antisemitism?
Shall we?
Don't be scared.
-Hey. -Hey, Rafi.
-[Rafi] Aharoni, come with me. -[Aharoni] You got it.
translation.it: Aharoni, vieni con me. Va bene.

translation.en: -Where you going? -[Rafi] Aharoni's got a flight to catch.
translation.it: Dove andate? Aharoni deve prendere un volo.

translation.en: I'll call if I need you.
-[Klaus] Sylvia. -Thank you.
-[Sylvia] Klaus, hi. -Hey.
You made it.
-Let me show you through. -Could we go somewhere first?
-I need to tell you something. Okay. -Can we wait? He's about to speak.
translation.it: - Devo dirti una cosa. - Dopo. Sta per parlare.

translation.en: -[Klaus] This is Sylvia. -[Sylvia] Hello.
My word.
Look at those eyes. Your hair.
translation.it: Guarda che occhi. E i capelli.

translation.en: Where's your family from?
-[Sylvia] Um, I'm... -[man] We're ready for you.
Come.
[Klaus] You see those two?
That's the Deputy Mayor and a member of Parliament.
translation.it: Il vice sindaco e un parlamentare.

translation.en: [Sylvia] Who is that man you introduced me to?
translation.it: Chi è quello che mi hai presentato?

translation.en: [Klaus] Carlos Fuldner. He helped my family settle in Argentina.
translation.it: Carlos Fuldner, ha aiutato la mia famiglia a sistemarsi in Argentina.

translation.en: Amigos...
our hundred fiftieth Independence Day approaches.
[Carlos] There will be a chance for us to dance,
to drink, for freedom.
[Carlos] But have you noticed the road blocks...
translation.it: Ma avete notato i posti di blocco,

translation.en: ...gunshots,
violence,
every day across Buenos Aires?
Now should be the time to celebrate our national unity,
the iron bond of church and state.
translation.it: il patto di ferro tra stato e chiesa.

translation.en: It doesn't decay, amigos.
A rot within our society,
translation.it: Un tarlo che sta erodendo la nostra società,

translation.en: that is forcing us to fight for our beloved and holy patria.
translation.it: e che ci impone di combattere per la nostra amata patria.

translation.en: Who can tell me its name?
Jew!
[in Spanish] Thank you, Father.
Loyal only to themselves.
The Jew will betray our homeland
translation.it: Gli ebrei tradiranno la nostra terra

translation.en: and continue poisoning this great nation of Argentina.
translation.it: continuando a inquinare la grande Argentina.

translation.en: So, I ask you.
What should we do with the Jew?
translation.it: Cosa dovremmo farci, con gli ebrei?

translation.en: Soap.
Again.
What must we make of the Jew?
translation.it: Cosa dovremmo farci, con gli ebrei?

translation.en: [crowd] Soap!
-Jew! Jew! Jew! -[crowd] Soap! Soap! Soap!
translation.it: - Ebrei! - Sapone! - Ebrei! - Sapone! - Ebrei! - Sapone!

translation.en: -[Carlos] Sieg heil! Sieg heil! -[crowd] Sieg heil! Sieg heil!
translation.it: - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil!

translation.en: -[Carlos] Sieg heil! Sieg heil! Sieg heil! -[crowd] Sieg heil! Sieg heil! Sieg heil!
translation.it: - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil! - Sieg heil!

translation.en: -[Carlos] Sieg heil! -[crowd] Sieg heil!
-[Carlos] Sieg heil! Sieg heil! -[crowd] Sieg heil! Sieg heil!
[male player 1] Okay. Are you in, or are you out?
-[male player 2] In. -[male player 1] Peter, your turn.
translation.it: - Ci sto. - Videl tocca a te.

translation.en: [male player 1] Peter, let's go. Play.
Hey, hey, hey!
Come on, kids.
Hello.
Mama?
Mama, what's wrong? What happened?
[mother] Your sister.
She was on top and I closed it.
translation.it: Stava sul frigo, e l'ho chiuso.

translation.en: It's all right. I'm sure she forgives you.
translation.it: Tranquilla, sono sicuro che ti perdonerà.

translation.en: Look.
Beautiful.
Go put them in some water. I'll clean up.
translation.it: Mettile in un vaso, qui pulisco io.

translation.en: New refrigerator, huh?
Who'd you kill to get that?
Seriously, should I worry? Is there a dead body in there?
translation.it: Devo preoccuparmi? C'è mica un cadavere, dentro?

translation.en: I haven't seen Hanna lately.
translation.it: Non vedo Hanna da un po'.

translation.en: Mama, please.
What? First you see her all the time.
-No relationship talk. -You were ready...
-We've been over this. Eat your soup. -...to start something. Poof. She's gone.
translation.it: - Ne abbiamo discusso. Mangia. - ...e invece, puf! Sparita.

translation.en: Please.
Peter, don't you dare. It's Shabbat.
translation.it: Peter, non ci provare. È Shabbat.

translation.en: It could be an emergency.
Don't come complaining to me if you get sick after eating cold soup.
translation.it: Non ti lamentare se poi ti ammali per la zuppa fredda.

translation.en: Who gets sick from eating cold soup? Ma, please. Hello.
translation.it: Ma chi si ammala per una zuppa fredda? Dai. Pronto?

translation.en: Is this about the Astypalaia thing?
Because, to be honest, I've read maybe 70% of the briefing.
translation.it: - Perché ho letto il 70% del fascicolo. - No.

translation.en: -[Rafi] No, it is not. -Okay, good, 'cause it's more like 30%.
translation.it: - Perché ho letto il 70% del fascicolo. - No. Bene, perché era il 30%.

translation.en: [Rafi] Aharoni's out there now running reconnaissance in Buenos Aires
translation.it: Aharoni è già a Buenos Aires in ricognizione

translation.en: with our guy at the Embassy.
Our contact's daughter, Sylvia Hermann,
translation.it: La figlia del contatto, Sylvia Hermann,

translation.en: has agreed to take us to Klaus Eichmann's family home.
translation.it: ha accettato di condurci alla casa di Klaus Eichmann.

translation.en: If it is Eichmann, they will attempt to get a positive photo ID.
translation.it: Se è Eichmann, tenteranno di identificarlo con una foto.

translation.en: Why didn't you ask me? Aharoni's an interrogator.
translation.it: Perché non hai mandato me? Aharoni è un interrogatore.

translation.en: [Rafi] Precisely.
I wanted someone who would interrogate the evidence rather than just shoot at it.
translation.it: Volevo uno che "interrogasse" le prove, non che gli sparasse.

translation.en: This is strictly catch and extract.
Raf, if it is him, a bullet would be easier than dragging him here.
translation.it: Raf, se è lui, sarà più facile sparargli che trascinarlo qui.

translation.en: Eichmann will stand trial here in Israel.
Trial? Nobody needs to hear what he has to say.
[Rafi] The Prime Minister disagrees.
A trial will help put all of this to bed.
After all, not everyone's as emotionally balanced as you are.
translation.it: Non tutti sono emotivamente equilibrati come te.

translation.en: Peter, it isn't about you, okay?
translation.it: Peter, non si tratta di te, ok?

translation.en: Okay. I'm in.
[Harel] You're not going.
Every op leader describes you as manipulative, impulsive and self-absorbed.
translation.it: Tutti ti descrivono come manipolatore, impulsivo ed egocentrico.

translation.en: [Peter] No one mentioned my sense of humor?
[Harel] And the fiasco in Austria.
The strings I had to pull. You killed the wrong damn Nazi!
translation.it: Ti ho salvato io. Hai ucciso il nazista sbagliato!

translation.en: I remember, sir. It wasn't even the right Nazi.
translation.it: Lo so, signore. Non era neanche il nazista giusto.

translation.en: We are talking about violating Argentina's sovereignty
while they are celebrating 150 years of independence.
If we fail, Israel will be humiliated,
the local Jews terrorized, and I've lost some of my best agents.
translation.it: gli ebrei locali terrorizzati e io avrò perso i miei agenti migliori.

translation.en: So, what makes him worth the risk?
For starters, this current plan's a real piece of shit.
translation.it: Tanto per cominciare, il piano fa schifo.

translation.en: [Harel] Great start.
[Rafi] Peter.
If you wanna get him out alive, you need a basic crew.
translation.it: Peter, per prenderlo vivo - serve una piccola squadra. - Niente soldati o armi. Punto.

translation.en: No soldiers, no guns. Period.
translation.it: - serve una piccola squadra. - Niente soldati o armi. Punto.

translation.en: If we get into a shoot-out, we've failed already
translation.it: Se si arriva alle armi, abbiamo perso.

translation.en: and it says here that you want to extract him
translation.it: Qui poi dice che lo volete trasferire

translation.en: via shipping container, but that would take weeks.
translation.it: via container, ma ci vorrebbero settimane.

translation.en: We do that, he won't make it past Rio. The only way is by plane.
translation.it: Non passerebbe Rio. L'unico modo è l'aereo.

translation.en: [Harel] Military planes can't reach Argentina.
translation.it: I nostri aerei militari non volano in Argentina.

translation.en: You think I haven't thought about it?
No, I'm sorry. Of course, sir. Of course.
translation.it: No, mi scusi. Certo che l'ha fatto.

translation.en: I'm guessing El Al is not an option.
translation.it: E la compagnia di bandiera non è un'opzione.

translation.en: El Al doesn't fly commercially to Argentina.
translation.it: Non ci sono voli commerciali per l'Argentina.

translation.en: Perhaps if we had a good cover story, they could be convinced?
translation.it: Magari potremmo convincerli con una bella copertura?

translation.en: Maybe.
[Peter] You said it's Argentina's 150th anniversary, right?
Yeah.
So we get ambassadors, politicians, whatever,
translation.it: Per cui ci saranno ambasciatori, politici, eccetera.

translation.en: send them over there to say, "Mazel tov. Hurrah for independence."
translation.it: Mandiamoli laggiù a fargli fare le congratulazioni.

translation.en: [Rafi] We'll invite Abba Eban, everybody loves him.
translation.it: Invitiamo Abba Eban, piace a tutti.

translation.en: Then we sneak Eichmann on board, airlift him here direct.
translation.it: E infiliamo Eichmann sul volo di ritorno.

translation.en: [Harel] What about airport security?
I'll disguise him to look like one of us.
translation.it: Lo travestiremo da uno di noi.

translation.en: -[Rafi] He'll struggle. -We'll sedate him.
Make him seem hung over, drunk to shit.
[Harel] To keep him in that state for hours.
translation.it: Tenerlo in quello stato per ore...

translation.en: -The only agent that we have-- -[Rafi] Had.
What?
She's refused every job I've offered her after Bren.
translation.it: Ha rifiutato tutti gli incarichi dopo Bren.

translation.en: That wasn't Hanna's fault though. The guy was allergic, right?
translation.it: Non è stata colpa di Hanna. Il tipo era allergico, no?

translation.en: She's the only one with the right field experience for this.
-I'll get her to do it. -I thought you two weren't...
translation.it: - La convincerò. - Pensavo che voi due non...

translation.en: -What, together? -Speaking.
She'll do it, trust me. Sir...
we'll get him back here alive.
Get Hanna on board, then we talk.
translation.it: Convincete Hanna, e se ne può parlare.

translation.en: -Five minutes. Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear.
Is Mrs. Levington in prep? ECG done?
translation.it: La Sig. ra Levington è pronta? Fatto l'ECG?

translation.en: -You know how important this is. -Hi, Michael. See you tonight.
translation.it: - Sai quant'è importante. - Ciao, Michael. A stasera.

translation.en: Who's Michael?
What's tonight?
The trains that shipped the families to the camps, that was him.
translation.it: I treni che deportavano la gente ai campi. È stata opera sua.

translation.en: -I'm not joining your hit squad. -[Peter] No, that...
translation.it: - Non sarò nella tua squadra di killer. - Non...

translation.en: Yes, I would happily put a bullet in-between his eyes,
translation.it: Certo, gli metterei volentieri una palla in fronte,

translation.en: but that's not what we're doing.
Did you hear what happened last time?
translation.it: Hai sentito cosa mi è successo?

translation.en: Yeah. Rafi told me. The guy was allergic.
translation.it: Sì, Rafi me l'ha detto. Il tipo era allergico.

translation.en: That's what he told you?
[Hanna] No, we kept on landing and refueling.
translation.it: No, il volo è stato lungo.

translation.en: Rafi kept telling me to put him under again and again and again.
translation.it: Rafi mi disse di sedarlo, più e più volte.

translation.en: So, I did.
That was Rafi's fault, not yours.
My needle, my fault.
First do no harm, that's what we swear, and I won't break it, not again!
translation.it: "Non nuocere" è il nostro giuramento. E non lo infrangerò mai più!

translation.en: That's why we need you.
In Buenos Aires.
Where we'll need you to eat steak.
And drink red wine and definitely go tango dancing.
translation.it: berremo del vino rosso e balleremo un tango.

translation.en: I need you.
-[Aharoni] Another road block. -[man] For the 150th.
translation.it: Un altro posto di blocco. Per il 150°.

translation.en: The government says they're protecting democracy.
translation.it: Il governo dice che proteggono la democrazia.

translation.en: They're all over the city.
What are they so afraid of?
[man] Commies.
Jews.
Nacionalistas, Peronistas.
Depends who you ask.
You clear on the plan?
Knock on the door, deliver the gift,
translation.it: Busso alla porta, consegno il regalo,

translation.en: get his uncle outside, don't give them cause for suspicion.
translation.it: faccio uscire lo zio, senza insospettirli.

translation.en: Enough of that to go around already.
translation.it: C'è già troppa paura in giro.

translation.en: [Aharoni] Listen carefully, all right?
If you're feeling any kind of danger whatsoever, you get out.
translation.it: Se avverti qualche tipo pericolo, tu esci.

translation.en: It's going to be all right.
Yes. May I help you?
Hello. My name is Sylvia. I'm...
You're the Sylvia.
We wondered whether we would get to meet you.
translation.it: Ci chiedevamo se ti avremmo mai conosciuta.

translation.en: Well, come in.
-Come in. -Thank you.
Oh, I'll just...
[Sylvia] Oh my, those are beautiful.
Oh, aren't they?
Is it a special occasion?
This year even more so.
Smell them.
Smell them.
Oh, hello there.
[woman] Oh, darling. This is Sylvia.
The Sylvia.
Such a pleasure.
[Sylvia] Klaus and I had a bit of a disagreement, so I thought I would come over and...
translation.it: Io e Klaus abbiamo avuto una piccola divergenza e ho pensato di venire per...

translation.en: try to fix things.
-[woman] Oh. -[baby coos]
That's very thoughtful.
I'll make us come coffee.
Oh, no thank you. I can't stay long.
No, please. We're delighted to have you.
translation.it: Per favore. È un piacere averti qui.

translation.en: [Eichmann] The munchkin is ready for a nap.
translation.it: Il piccolino è pronto per la nanna.

translation.en: Papa is ready for munchkin to have his nap. -[Eichmann chuckles] -[baby laughs]
translation.it: No, il papà è pronto per liberarsene.

translation.en: So, what do you think?
I'm sorry?
The house.
I mean, there's still no electricity, but she's getting there.
translation.it: Non c'è ancora corrente, ma arriverà.

translation.en: Yes, it's quite lovely, Herr...?
[Sylvia] Señor Klement.
I'm sorry.
[Eichmann] The disagreement you had.
I don't wish to pry, but would you describe to me its nature?
translation.it: ...non vorrei impicciarmi, ma di che natura era?

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia, what are you doing here?
-[Eichmann] Hey, watch your tone, Klaus. -I just came to apologize.
translation.it: Klaus, modera il tono. Sono venuta a scusarmi.

translation.en: Klaus, you're just in time for coffee.
translation.it: Klaus, giusto in tempo per il caffè.

translation.en: No. Sylvia's leaving.
translation.it: No. Sylvia se ne sta andando.

translation.en: Now hold on just a minute.
Klaus. I said wait a moment.
This is how I taught you to behave, is it?
translation.it: È questa l'educazione che ti ho dato?

translation.en: I'm sorry, Father.
You've no need to call me that.
translation.it: Non devi per forza chiamarmi così.

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia.
[Klaus] Sylvia.
-[Aharoni] Did you get it? -[man] I don't know.
[Aharoni] What about the girl?
She'll take the bus.
Get out of here.
Listen.
You embarrassed me.
-Leaving the meeting like that. -I know.
translation.it: - Andando via in quel modo. - Lo so.

translation.en: I had to leave, and I'm sorry.
He said he thought you might be a...
I am.
[Sylvia] Does that really matter to you?
[Rafi] Isser is here.
[Rafi] This is Dani Shalom from documents, and you know Moshe, he'd handle the vehicles.
translation.it: Lui è Dani Shalom dall'archivio, e conosci già Moshe, autoreparto.

translation.en: [Harel] Where's Hanna?
Sorry I'm late, sir.
That steak better be good.
[Harel] Okay.
[Harel] This is everything Sylvia Hermann could give us.
translation.it: Questo è tutto ciò che abbiamo da Sylvia Hermann.

translation.en: As for the pictures, our guy at Tel Hashomer Hospital is saying the ears match.
translation.it: Per la foto, da Tel HaShomer dicono che le orecchie corrispondono.

translation.en: Hardly compelling evidence.
Sylvia heard Klaus call him father.
-"You don't need to call me that." -[Harel] Not enough.
translation.it: - "Non devi per forza chiamarmi così." - È poco.

translation.en: You have to make sure it's him. Give me documentary proof. Come on.
translation.it: Dobbiamo esserne sicuri. Voglio prove documentate.

translation.en: Wait. Look.
The flowers.
-Here. -Vera implied it was a special occasion.
translation.it: - Qui. - Vera ha parlato di una ricorrenza.

translation.en: "This year even more so."
-What date was Sylvia there? -Uh...
[Hanna] Here.
The marriage certificate.
-[Rafi] Hey, careful. -Like it makes a difference.
There's a system to this.
[Peter] Here.
Why is 1960 a special year?
Because 25 years ago Adolf Eichmann
married his wife, Vera Liebl, on the 21st of March.
translation.it: sposò sua moglie, Vera Liebl, il 21 marzo.

translation.en: [Peter] We have our guy.
Ricardo Klement is Adolf Eichmann.
[Peter] All right. Round two.
-[piano playing] -[Peter] Next week in Buenos Aires.
translation.it: Tra sette giorni a Buenos Aires.

translation.en: Yaakov, welcome. Our wonderful front man.
translation.it: Yakoov, benvenuto. Il nostro uomo di punta.

translation.en: He's a little ugly, but we'll make do, right?
translation.it: È bruttino, ma ci accontenteremo, giusto?

translation.en: [Yaakov in Hebrew] Todah rabah.
Okay. For the ones who can't.
translation.it: Ok. Per quelli che non ci sono più.

translation.en: -[Hanna in Hebrew] Yimakh shimo. -[everyone] Yimakh shimo.
May his name be obliterated, huh?
So, why are we making him famous?
[Moshe] We should be putting him down like a mad dog.
translation.it: Lo dovremmo abbattere come un cane rabbioso.

translation.en: That's not what I'm here for, Moshe.
translation.it: Non sono qui per questo, Moshe.

translation.en: [Moshe] Yeah?
How many did you lose?
I'm not competing with you.
What?
-We're really doing this? -Yeah.
[Yaakov] All right, asshole.
My parents, aunts, uncles, four cousins.
translation.it: Genitori, zie, zii e quattro cugini.

translation.en: [Dani Shalom] I'm the only one left.
[Peter] Hey, Moshe, enough.
All right? Raf, you know any rock 'n roll?
translation.it: Ok? Raf, conosci del rock 'n' roll?

translation.en: Is the Pope Catholic?
-[piano playing cheerful music] -This.
-Shall we dance, yeah? Let's. -Let's dance.
[Harel] On your feet for the Prime Minister.
translation.it: In piedi per il Primo Ministro.

translation.en: [Rafi] Oh, shit. It's Ben-Gurion. Get up. Get up.
[man] Sir.
-Is this all of them? -Yes.
[Ben-Gurion] Good.
If you succeed...
we deny the world the chance to let Eichmann's...
translation.it: impediremo alle atrocità commesse da Eichmann

translation.en: murderous edicts sink into obscurity.
translation.it: di cadere per sempre nel dimenticatoio.

translation.en: For the first time in our history, we will judge our executioner.
translation.it: Per la prima volta nella storia, processeremo un nostro boia.

translation.en: We will also warn off any who may wish to follow his example.
translation.it: E sarà un avvertimento per coloro che vorranno riprovarci.

translation.en: If you fail...
he escapes justice.
Perhaps forever.
For the sake of our people, I beg you, do not fail.
translation.it: Per il bene del nostro popolo, vi imploro di non sbagliare.

translation.en: [Ben-Gurion] Our memory reaches back through recorded history.
translation.it: La nostra memoria risale fino alla notte dei tempi.

translation.en: [Ben-Gurion] The book of memories still lies open.
translation.it: Ma la storia si scrive di continuo.

translation.en: And you here now...
are the hand that holds the pen.
translation.it: siete la mano che impugna la penna.

translation.en: -[official] Bienvenidos a Argentina. -[Yaakov] Muchas gracias.
Why have they sent you?
-Disappointed? -[chuckles]
[Yaakov] I think we'll take this one.
translation.it: Credo che prenderemo questa, con la recinzione.

translation.en: [official] Excellent.
Good choice.
[in Spanish] Yes.
[Yaakov] And an apartment for my assistant. Nothing fancy.
translation.it: Anche un appartamentino per la mia assistente. Niente di lusso.

translation.en: Keep your hands to yourself.
Or Malkin will kick my ass?
translation.it: O Malkin mi fa il culo?

translation.en: I'll kick your ass.
There's still the thing with you two.
[Yaakov] He'll let you down, you know?
[Yaakov] He lets everyone down.
[Yaakov] Ladies and gentlemen, behold, terra, the best safe house money can buy.
translation.it: Signore e signori. Ecco, "Terra", il miglior rifugio che potevamo permetterci.

translation.en: With the finest in counter-surveillance technology.
translation.it: Il meglio della tecnologia di sorveglianza.

translation.en: [Eichmann] I've lived enough of life looking over my shoulder.
translation.it: Come se non avessi già vissuto abbastanza nella paura.

translation.en: I only did what little I could in Germany's fight against her enemy.
translation.it: Il mio ruolo contro i nemici della Germania fu di poco conto.

translation.en: [Carlos] What a narrative. What tales.
[Carlos] Tell me, these story telling sessions, are they for money or for pleasure?
translation.it: Mi dica, questi incontri li fa per soldi o per passione?

translation.en: For posterity, to correct the lies told by those swine at Nuremberg.
translation.it: Per i posteri, per correggere le menzogne di quei maiali di Norimberga.

translation.en: You left so quickly after our rally, we didn't have a chance to talk.
translation.it: Se n'è andato in fretta dopo il raduno e non abbiamo avuto modo di parlare.

translation.en: I wasn't aware a discussion was to be had, Carlos.
translation.it: Non pensavo ci fosse altro da dire, Carlos.

translation.en: You saw the support we have.
The government is teetering. Soon we can come out of the shadows.
translation.it: Il governo tentenna. Presto potremo uscire allo scoperto.

translation.en: All we need is organization.
A mind like yours.
-[Peter] Who's this Fuldner guy? -[Aharoni] SS Officer.
translation.it: Chi è questo Fuldner? Un ufficiale delle SS.

translation.en: Worked with the Vatican,
then Peron to get Hitler's higher-ranking officers out of Europe.
translation.it: poi con Peron per far uscire i burocrati di Hitler dall'Europa.

translation.en: They keep a low profile, but they'll make themselves known if we slip up.
translation.it: Mantengono un basso profilo, ma si faranno sentire, se sbagliamo.

translation.en: -I've written this all down. -Oh.
Yeah, I'll read this.
Right.
[Peter] The man is a human metronome.
translation.it: Il tipo è un metronomo umano.

translation.en: Every morning he goes to work at a Mercedes factory in Gonzales Catan,
translation.it: Ogni mattina va a lavorare in una fabbrica Mercedes a Gonzales Catan.

translation.en: same time, same two buses, there and back.
translation.it: Stessa ora, stessi autobus andata e ritorno.

translation.en: [man] Why don't we grab him at the factory?
translation.it: - E se lo preleviamo in fabbrica? - Troppa gente.

translation.en: [Rafi] It's too public. One witness and we're screwed.
translation.it: - E se lo preleviamo in fabbrica? - Troppa gente. Un solo testimone e siamo fregati.

translation.en: [Peter] And on his journey home it's darker, there's fewer witnesses.
translation.it: Un solo testimone e siamo fregati. E al ritorno è più buio, meno persone in giro.

translation.en: [Dani] Any blind spots?
There are lamp posts here, here, and here.
translation.it: Ci sono lampioni qui, qui e qui. C'è una zona d'ombra di 5 metri.

translation.en: There's a blind spot about five meters. Should be pitch black at night.
translation.it: Ci sono lampioni qui, qui e qui. C'è una zona d'ombra di 5 metri. Di notte lì dovrebbe essere buio pesto.

translation.en: That's where you grab him, and then hold him here a few hours ahead of flying.
translation.it: Ecco dove lo prenderete, poi lo terrete qui le ore prima del volo.

translation.en: -[Peter] Can we get him to the airport? -No, It's too dangerous.
translation.it: - Non andiamo subito in aeroporto? - No, troppo pericoloso.

translation.en: [Hanna] I'll be giving him micro doses of Haloperidol throughout security.
translation.it: Gli darò microdosi di Aloperidolo per fargli passare i controlli.

translation.en: The set-up needs to be precise,
so fixing it in the back of the car, it's too risky.
translation.it: perciò non nel bagagliaio, è troppo rischioso.

translation.en: The wrong dose and he could slip into cardiac arrest.
translation.it: La dose sbagliata e potrebbe andare in arresto cardiaco.

translation.en: Okay. Everyone got what they need? [Yaakov] Strips of soft metal.
translation.it: - Ok. Avete tutti quel che vi serve? - Strisce di metallo dolce.

translation.en: -[Harel] Okay. -Tin, ideally.
[Ilani] Write it down.
I'm putting together a squad of sayanim to help.
translation.it: Appronterò una squadra di Sayanim a supporto.

translation.en: Are we sure we can trust the local Jews to be loyal to us and not the Argentines?
translation.it: Siamo sicuri che gli ebrei locali stiano dalla nostra parte?

translation.en: Yeah. Efraim worked with them before, right?
translation.it: Sì. Efraim ci ha già lavorato, no?

translation.en: Yeah, that's correct. They know the city, speak the language.
translation.it: Esatto. Conoscono la città, parlano la lingua.

translation.en: They'll help limit our exposure.
People are gonna say it's a real international Jewish conspiracy.
translation.it: Diranno che si tratta di un complotto ebraico internazionale.

translation.en: -[everyone chuckles] -[Harel] Okay. Hey, the plane will arrive in four days.
translation.it: Ok, ehi. L'aereo arriva tra quattro giorni.

translation.en: This is the last time you're gonna see me until we have him.
translation.it: Mi rivedrete solo dopo la cattura.

translation.en: If you need me, leave me a note at the Embassy.
translation.it: Se serve, lasciatemi un messaggio all'Ambasciata.

translation.en: Otherwise, no contact in case I'm followed.
We'll exchange money and documents in cafes.
translation.it: Scambieremo soldi e documenti nei bar.

translation.en: From now on, every move you make, and every second it takes,
translation.it: A partire da ora, ogni mossa e ogni secondo possono essere vitali,

translation.en: counts for everything, so don't make any stupid mistakes.
translation.it: A partire da ora, ogni mossa e ogni secondo possono essere vitali, perciò non fate stupidi errori.

translation.en: That's very inspiring.
-[Moshe] What about his family? -[radio in Spanish]
[Moshe] What if they call the police or worse?
translation.it: Se chiamano la polizia, o peggio?

translation.en: [Peter] Authorities aren't gonna stick their necks out for a Nazi on Independence Day.
translation.it: Le autorità non rischieranno per un nazista, il giorno dell'Indipendenza.

translation.en: And the safe house still isn't right. I'm telling you. Three days isn't enough.
translation.it: E il rifugio non è ancora pronto. - Tre giorni sono pochi. - Ce la faremo, basta preoccuparsi.

translation.en: We're gonna make it work. Relax. Stop worrying.
translation.it: - Tre giorni sono pochi. - Ce la faremo, basta preoccuparsi.

translation.en: [Moshe] Sounds like Khrushchev got some American.
translation.it: Pare che Chruščëv abbia catturato degli americani.

translation.en: -Spy pilot I think. -[Peter] Shit.
Poor guy.
I hear the Commies like to use their fingernails, tear 'em out.
translation.it: Ho sentito che i comunisti usano le loro unghie, gliene strappano via.

translation.en: [Peter] Shots of adrenaline straight after, stops you from fainting.
translation.it: E poi iniettano adrenalina per non farti svenire.

translation.en: [Moshe] Think the Argies would do that to us?
translation.it: Credi che gli argentini ce lo farebbero?

translation.en: [Moshe] You ever think about whether we'll get to do that to him?
translation.it: Pensi mai che dovremmo torturarlo così?

translation.en: [Peter] That's not why we're here. [Moshe] Come on, Habibi.
translation.it: - Non siamo qui per questo. - E dai, amico.

translation.en: You're telling me that after what that fuck did to us,
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che ci ha fatto quella merda,

translation.en: you didn't want someone here ready and willing to make him scream?
translation.it: non vorresti ci fosse qui qualcuno per farlo urlare?

translation.en: -You can have the bed, sir. -Yaakov, son of a bitch.
translation.it: - Può prendere il letto, signore. - Yaakov, figlio di puttana.

translation.en: [Ilani] ...and never return to the same store in the same day.
translation.it: Non entrate due volte in un negozio lo stesso giorno.

translation.en: You'll work in shifts.
-My father... -[Ilani] Graciela?
My father said we'd be paid?
translation.it: Mio padre ha detto che saremo pagati?

translation.en: Expenses only, I'm afraid.
The real reward will be when Rabbi Levy dedicates a hymn to you.
translation.it: La vera ricompensa sarà il salmo che vi dedicherà il rabbino Levy.

translation.en: Graciela, you'll work in the safe house. The rest of you...
translation.it: Graciela, starai al rifugio. Gli altri...

translation.en: -[Hanna] Do you want another one? -[Peter] Maybe.
translation.it: - Vuoi che lo faccia io? - Forse.

translation.en: One more.
-Hey, Moshe. -[Moshe] Yeah.
Talk to me.
I saw him with his boy.
His son. Beautiful little boy.
They were watching the trains go by.
We're gonna get him.
He needs catching first.
-[man 1 in Spanish] Need any help? -[man 2 in Spanish] No, thank you.
Who the hell was that?
You ever seen that guy before?
[Peter] Here he comes.
I don't wanna touch his mouth.
-[Peter] Where is he? -[Rafi] Shit. He knows. He must know.
[Aharoni] We need to leave.
His wife and kid are home. He wouldn't leave without them.
translation.it: Ha moglie e figli a casa, non li abbandonerebbe.

translation.en: -[Rafi] He's done it before. -We have to warn the others.
translation.it: - L'ha già fatto. - Dobbiamo avvertire gli altri, forza.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go!
translation.it: - L'ha già fatto. - Dobbiamo avvertire gli altri, forza. Andiamo!

translation.en: Look.
Him..
-[Moshe] It's him. -[Aharoni] Why is there a second bus?
translation.it: È lui. Perché c'era un secondo bus?

translation.en: And that cyclist. I don't know, something feels off.
translation.it: E quel ciclista... non so, non mi piace.

translation.en: Your call.
Start the engine.
-Get the sedative. I got him. -Make a sound and I'll kill you.
translation.it: - Riprendila. Lo tengo io. - Un fiato e ti uccido.

translation.en: [Peter] Just be quiet, you'll be all right.
translation.it: Stai buono, e andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: [Rafi] Okay. Let's go.
[Peter] Cover his hands.
[guard speaking Spanish] Diplomatic plates. Wave them through.
If you speak without being spoken to, you will be gagged.
translation.it: Se parla senza essere interrogato, sarà imbavagliato.

translation.en: Open your eyes.
I want you to tell me your name.
translation.it: Voglio che mi dica il suo nome.

translation.en: [Eichmann] My name is Ricardo Klement. I'm a Jew from Palestine.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Ricardo Klement, sono un ebreo palestinese.

translation.en: No, you're not.
[Eichmann] I was born in Serona, the German quarter. I know my prayers. Listen.
translation.it: Sono nato a Sarona, nel quartiere tedesco. So pregare. Ascolti.

translation.en: Tell me your name.
Shma Yisrael, adonai elohenu, adonai echad.
translation.it: She-ma yisrael, adonai eloheinu, adonai echad.

translation.en: [Eichmann] You see?
You've made a mistake.
Drop me anywhere. Blindfold me.
I won't tell anyone what you've done.
[in Hebrew] Where did you live?
I'll admit I'm a little rusty.
translation.it: Ammetto di essere un po' arrugginito.

translation.en: You were born in Solingen in 1906.
translation.it: Lei è nato a Solingen nel 1906.

translation.en: Your father was named Adolf.
-Your mother Maria Shefferling. -I don't know those names.
translation.it: - Sua madre Maria Schefferling. - Non so chi siano.

translation.en: It's not true. My surname's Klement.
translation.it: È falso. Il mio cognome è Klement.

translation.en: Yet the boy you raise has the name Eichmann, does he not?
translation.it: Il ragazzo che ha cresciuto si chiama Eichmann, no?

translation.en: His father died during the war.
translation.it: Il padre è morto durante la guerra.

translation.en: So, you let another man's progeny call you father.
translation.it: Quindi si fa chiamare "padre" dal figlio di un altro.

translation.en: What is your current profession?
Foreman. Mercedes Benz factory.
-Current address. -14 Garibaldi Street.
-What is-- -What is your wife's name? Vera. Vera Liebl.
translation.it: - Come si chiama sua moglie? - Vera. Vera Liebl.

translation.en: Who is your son Klaus's father? What is your name?
translation.it: Chi è il padre di Klaus? Come si chiama?

translation.en: I am Ricardo Klement.
So, you raise another man's child,
translation.it: Quindi ha cresciuto il figlio di un altro,

translation.en: but you feel only obligation, correct?
translation.it: ma sente solo dei doveri, giusto?

translation.en: Should something happen to him, like,
oh, I don't know, let's say he should suddenly...
disappear tomorrow,
a part of you wouldn't care?
translation.it: A una parte di lei non importerebbe?

translation.en: You once had a mistress named Maria Masenbucher.
-Did you not? -Not that I recall.
translation.it: - Non è così? - Non che io ricordi.

translation.en: That's interesting, because she gave us a picture.
translation.it: Strano, perché ci ha dato una fotografia.

translation.en: Do you recognize the man in this picture?
I can't see him clearly.
Who has his glasses?
The man in this picture is you.
SS number 45381. Am I correct?
Again. Your number was 45381.
[Aharoni] Your number was 45381.

translation.it: Era quattro, cinque, tre, due, sei.

translation.en: Enough. I accept my fate.
My name is Adolf Eichmann.
-L'Chaim. -L'Chaim.
-L'Chaim. -[all] L'Chaim.
-[Rafi] All right. -[Hanna laughs]
[Rafi] Enjoy. We pack up after dinner.
translation.it: Buon appetito. Si parte dopo cena.

translation.en: What's wrong?
[Peter] We've got him.
Peace?
My mama spends her days in a dark apartment alone,
translation.it: Mia madre passa le giornate in casa al buio. Da sola,

translation.en: because of what men like him have done.
translation.it: a causa di uomini come lui.

translation.en: When she can see the look on Eichmann's face
translation.it: Quando vedrà lo sguardo di Eichmann...

translation.en: when he finds himself in a country full of us,
translation.it: Quando lui si troverà in un paese pieno di noi...

translation.en: that's when I'll have peace.
Come on, Klaus. Rack your brain. Who knew?
translation.it: Andiamo, Klaus. Fai mente locale. Chi sapeva?

translation.en: -[officer] Lothar Hermann? -[in Spanish] Yes.
[officer in Spanish] Is your daughter home?
[Lothar in Spanish] She's out of the country.
[officer in Spanish] Take him.
[Ilani in Spanish] Is the plane ready?
[in Spanish] I've got bad news.
[Peter] All right, let's get changed and get out of here.
translation.it: Ok, cambiamoci e andiamo via da qui.

translation.en: [Ilani] Listen everyone.
There is a problem with the flight. -[Peter] What? -[Harel] What?
translation.it: - C'è un problema col volo. - Che?

translation.en: The airport says it's delayed by ten days.
translation.it: Pare ci sia un ritardo di dieci giorni.

translation.en: -Nobody knows. -[Peter] Shit. Ten days! Oh, shit.
translation.it: - Nessuno sa perché. - Merda. Dieci giorni!

translation.en: It's coincidence. It's too soon for anyone to know.
translation.it: È un caso. Impossibile che si sia già saputo.

translation.en: -Not if they found the glasses. -[Aharoni] They know.
translation.it: - Non se hanno trovato gli occhiali. - Lo sanno.

translation.en: [Rafi] Okay. Ephraim, tomorrow morning you and Moshe, you return the cars.
translation.it: Ok, Ephraim, domattina tu e Moshe restituite le auto.

translation.en: If they quibble about damages, you pay whatever they say.
translation.it: Se vi contestano i danni, pagate e zitti.

translation.en: -[Ilani] We'll need money. -I'll take care of it.
translation.it: - Servono più soldi. - Ci penso io.

translation.en: We're gonna need to watch him 24 hours a day. We'll do it in shifts.
translation.it: Dobbiamo sorvegliarlo 24 ore al giorno. - Faremo i turni. - Dobbiamo stare con lui?

translation.en: Now you need us in the room with him?
translation.it: - Faremo i turni. - Dobbiamo stare con lui?

translation.en: He could swallow his tongue, try to hang himself.
translation.it: Potrebbe ingoiare la lingua o impiccarsi.

translation.en: We're not gonna let him get out of this. Understood?
translation.it: Non deve sfuggire al suo destino. Chiaro?

translation.en: [Rafi] Aharoni's the only one who speaks to him.
If you have something to say, keep it to yourself. Got it?
translation.it: Se avete qualcosa da dire, tenetevela per voi.

translation.en: [Moshe] And if they find us?
We're not just gonna let him go, are we? [Rafi] Hey. Shh.
translation.it: - Non lo lasceremo andare, giusto? - Ehi.

translation.en: -Quiet. He can hear everything. -[Peter] We have him.
translation.it: Piano, ci può sentire. È nostro.

translation.en: Now we just lay low, play the "who's the worst cook than Rafi?" game.
translation.it: Ora restiamo al coperto, e giochiamo a chi cucina peggio di Rafi.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -[Peter] Hard part's over.
[Rafi] Germany issued an extradition request a few months back
translation.it: La Germania ha richiesto l'estradizione, qualche mese fa,

translation.en: and they suspect he's hiding here, too.
translation.it: e sospettano stia nascondendo anche lei.

translation.en: [Harel] Okay. From now on, nobody leave this house.
translation.it: Ok, d'ora in poi, nessuno lascia la casa.

translation.en: -[Aharoni] That's right. We all sit tight. -[Hanna] A scared old blind man.
translation.it: - Sì, tutti a cuccia. - Un povero vecchio cieco.

translation.en: -It's our fault they got him. -[Peter] What are you doing here?
translation.it: - È colpa nostra se l'hanno preso. - Che fai qui?

translation.en: The police arrested Lothar Hermann, claiming he's Joseph Mengele.
translation.it: Hanno arrestato Lothar Hermann, perché dicono sia Josef Mengele.

translation.en: -Joseph Mengele. -[Rafi] Yeah.
The angel of death himself.
-[Hanna] This is a bad joke. -This is Fuldner's people.
translation.it: - È uno scherzo. - È gente di Fuldner.

translation.en: They're using him as bait.
[Harel] It's worse than that. El Al is refusing to send a plane.
translation.it: C'è di peggio. La EI AI non ci manda l'aereo.

translation.en: They say first they need something from us.
A signed document from Eichmann saying he'll willingly come to Israel.
translation.it: Una dichiarazione dove Eichmann dice di voler venire in Israele.

translation.en: [Peter] What?
-They're out of their minds. -Enough!
Can't we have Dani fake it?
No, we have no idea what his signature looks like.
translation.it: No, non sappiamo com'è la sua firma.

translation.en: Can you squeeze a signature out of him?
Can you? Of course, yeah.
Well, he's going to need to read it. Did you replace the glasses that you lost?
translation.it: Dovrà prima leggerla. Hai sostituito gli occhiali smarriti?

translation.en: Thank you. For these.
[Eichmann] I'm grateful.
You want me to stand trial in place of an entire regime?
translation.it: Volete processarmi per le colpe di un intero regime?

translation.en: I'm offering you a fair trial.
translation.it: Le stiamo offrendo un processo equo.

translation.en: If these are German crimes, they should be tried in German courts.
translation.it: Se sono crimini tedeschi, dovrei essere giudicato in Germania.

translation.en: -That's not an option. -Ask your superiors to negotiate.
translation.it: - Non è un'opzione. - Chieda ai suoi superiori di negoziare.

translation.en: If they refuse, I do, too.
I've no desire to be your scapegoat.
translation.it: Non sarò il vostro capro espiatorio.

translation.en: I'd argue the Architect of the Final Solution has plenty to answer for.
translation.it: Io direi che l'architetto della soluzione finale ha molto da farsi perdonare.

translation.en: The Architect... of the Final Solution.
-Do you deny your title? -We love nicknames.
translation.it: - Nega il suo titolo? - Ci piacciono i soprannomi!

translation.en: They used to call me the Little Jew.
Did you know that?
I read about Nuremberg.
Those swine, Wisliceny and Höttl.
Blaming the absent to escape the noose.
translation.it: Incolpare gli assenti per evitare il capestro.

translation.en: Well, then refute them. Come to Israel.
translation.it: Beh, li confuti. Venga in Israele.

translation.en: Make your case to the world.
I would rather die...
than have my history told the way someone else would like it to have been.
translation.it: piuttosto che far narrare la mia storia come vorrebbe qualcun altro.

translation.en: You have no interest in what I have to say,
translation.it: A voi non interessa quel che ho da dire,

translation.en: unless it confirms what you think you already know.
translation.it: a meno che non confermi quel che già sapete.

translation.en: [Aharoni] Tell me, what is it that I think I already know?
translation.it: E mi dica, cosa sarebbe ciò che già sappiamo?

translation.en: The...
-May I have a cigarette? -You may not.
[Eichmann] The exact consequences of my work were kept hidden from me.
translation.it: Sono stato tenuto all'oscuro degli effetti del mio lavoro.

translation.en: I was merely a cog in a machine...
translation.it: Ero un semplice ingranaggio del sistema.

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -...digging its way to hell.
translation.it: Ero un semplice ingranaggio del sistema. In una spirale infernale.

translation.en: By the end, I was chained to my desk.
translation.it: Verso la fine, ero letteralmente incatenato alla scrivania.

translation.en: Twenty hours a day.
My job was simple.
Save the country I love from being destroyed.
translation.it: Salvare il paese che amavo dalla distruzione.

translation.en: Is your job any different?
But none of what I say matters. Your lawyers and your lying press
translation.it: Ma ciò che dico non conta. I vostri avvocati e la stampa bugiarda

translation.en: will try the man they think they know, not the one who sits before you now.
translation.it: processeranno l'uomo che pensano di conoscere, non questo di fronte a lei.

translation.en: [Rafi] Forty, sixty, eighty, five hundred.
Okay.
Graciela?
-[Rafi] Eh... -Si?
[Rafi] Uh, groceries.
[Aharoni] Can someone else feed him?
translation.it: Qualcun altro può dargli da mangiare?

translation.en: -[Moshe] It's your turn. -[Aharoni] I know.
I'm... I'm asking for a favor.
[Peter] All done.
You're the man who grabbed me. I know your voice.
translation.it: Lei è quello che mi ha preso. Riconosco la voce.

translation.en: Yes.
Please, just tell me. My family, are they safe?
translation.it: Mi dica solo se la mia famiglia è al sicuro.

translation.en: [Klaus] You said you had news.
Do you know the number of people buried here because they wouldn't listen?
translation.it: Sai quanta gente è sepolta qui per non aver ascoltato?

translation.en: Everyone should visit this place once in a while
translation.it: Tutti dovrebbero venire qui, ogni tanto,

translation.en: to remember things can go the wrong way if you don't behave the proper way.
translation.it: per ricordarsi che le cose possono sfuggire di mano, se ci si comporta male.

translation.en: Two Jews returned a rented Buick to a shop near Acassuso.
translation.it: Due ebrei hanno riportato una Buick a un noleggio di Acassuso.

translation.en: [Carlos] They paid for it in US dollars,
but the vendor called the police when he saw the license plate had been tampered with.
translation.it: ma l'agenzia ha chiamato la polizia quando ha notato la targa contraffatta.

translation.en: -And the rental documents? -We don't know.
translation.it: - E i documenti di noleggio? - Non si sa.

translation.en: Their identification was forged.
We'll talk to shopkeepers.
If so much as an empanada is paid for in dollars, I want us to know.
translation.it: Se gli pagano anche solo una empanada in dollari, voglio saperlo.

translation.en: [Peter] It's too tight.
[Ilani] Don't any of them come with some actual shape to them?
translation.it: Non ci sono anche di altre misure?

translation.en: -Is there any medium? Okay. -[Harel] We are running out of time.
translation.it: - C'è una media? - Il tempo sta per scadere.

translation.en: [Harel] We have to get the signature.
[Aharoni] He's being belligerent.
The problem is he's got no incentive to sign it.
translation.it: Non ha alcun vantaggio a firmare.

translation.en: If the easy way doesn't work, do it the hard way.
translation.it: Se con le buone non funziona, prova con le cattive.

translation.en: You have my permission.
This guy convinced rabbis to load the trains themselves.
translation.it: Questo tizio ha convinto i rabbini a far riempire i treni con la propria gente.

translation.en: [Peter] And not by force.
You can't strong arm a guy like that,
translation.it: Non si vince a braccio di ferro, con lui.

translation.en: but if we can relate to him, if you appeal to his--
translation.it: Ma se in qualche modo riuscissimo a far leva su...

translation.en: Humanity?
His ego makes him feel like he's in control.
translation.it: Il suo ego... ...lo fa sentire potente.

translation.en: I appreciate you're trying to help, but he's as slippery as they come.
translation.it: Grazie per l'aiuto, ma è un osso duro.

translation.en: Spots tricks a mile away. This only works if we wear him down.
translation.it: Sente le fregature lontano un miglio. Possiamo solo sfinirlo.

translation.en: If he knows there's no escape, eventually he'll yield.
translation.it: Se capisce di non avere scampo, cederà.

translation.en: -That's not working. -You've done your job.
translation.it: - Non funziona. - Hai fatto la tua parte.

translation.en: Will you leave me to do mine?
[Eichmann] Let's put the shoe on your foot, shall we?
You're a soldier ordered to make me sign this,
translation.it: Lei è un soldato a cui è stato ordinato di farmi firmare questo,

translation.en: but are you or your superiors responsible for that order?
translation.it: ma lei o il suo superiore siete responsabili per quest'ordine?

translation.en: I'm offering you a fair trial.
translation.it: Le sto offrendo un giusto processo.

translation.en: [Eichmann] Herr Captor, I need the lavatory, please.
translation.it: Herr Sequestratore, mi serve il bagno.

translation.en: It's quite serious.
This would be much easier if I had something to read.
translation.it: Sarebbe più facile se avessi da leggere.

translation.en: Should we lend him your copy of Mein Kampf or mine?
translation.it: Gli do il mio Mein Kampf o il tuo?

translation.en: I remember visiting my father at the Tramway and Electrical. I was nine.
translation.it: Una volta andai a trovare mio padre in fabbrica, avevo nove anni.

translation.en: He introduces me so proudly.
"My boy!" He says, "This is my boy!"
So, imagine my dismay when I had to use the bathroom and unleash sheer hell.
translation.it: Immagini quindi lo sgomento quando dovetti usare il bagno per la diarrea.

translation.en: I said, "Everybody does it, Papa. Everybody shits."
I think about that still, to this day.
If only you'd cover my nose as well as my eyes.
translation.it: Se solo poteste tapparmi il naso, oltre agli occhi.

translation.en: [Yaakov] So, this is the master race.
translation.it: E questa sarebbe la razza superiore.

translation.en: Oh, we used to say to be the perfect Nazi,
translation.it: Oh, noi dicevamo che il nazista perfetto era magro come Goering,

translation.en: you had to be as slim as Goering, as tall as Goebbels, and as blond as Hitler!
translation.it: Oh, noi dicevamo che il nazista perfetto era magro come Goering, alto come Goebbels e biondo come Hitler!

translation.en: May I wipe now, Herr Captor?
[Eichmann] My family, are they safe, please?
translation.it: La mia famiglia è al sicuro? La prego.

translation.en: -Of course, they are. -[gasps]
-What do you think of us? -Thank you.
translation.it: - Per chi ci ha preso? - Grazie.

translation.en: [clears throat] Thank you.
translation.it: - Per chi ci ha preso? - Grazie. Grazie.

translation.en: Herr Captor.
I wonder if I might keep speaking with you.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo... se potessi continuare a parlare con lei.

translation.en: That Jobnik they send, he won't listen.
Round face, straight brown hair. Heavy set.
I want eyes at all major transit points.
translation.it: Sorvegliate tutte le agenzie di viaggi.

translation.en: This is one of the Jews who took Ricardo Klement.
translation.it: È uno degli ebrei che ha rapito Ricardo Klement.

translation.en: -[Moshe] Do you want some more? -[Hanna] No, thank you.
[Yaakov] Oh, great, beef again.
I'd kill for a fish.
[Rafi] Shut up and eat your cubed cheese.
translation.it: Zitto e mangia il tuo formaggio.

translation.en: Why is it so bland?
-[Aharoni] It's missing the bacteria. -Or a nice goat's cheese.
translation.it: Mancano alcuni batteri. - È formaggio di capra. - Sai quel lefta nostro?

translation.en: [Rafi] You know that Lifta cheese back home?
translation.it: - È formaggio di capra. - Sai quel lefta nostro?

translation.en: It's really strong.
[chuckling You remember when Miriam made a cheesecake with it by accident
translation.it: Ti ricordi quando Miriam per sbaglio ci fece una cheesecake?

translation.en: and you ate a whole slice just to make her happy.
translation.it: Tu ne mangiasti un'intera fetta per farla contenta.

translation.en: [laughing] "No, Mir, this is really good. Thank you."
You know, Lifta is an Arab cheese.
translation.it: - Il lefta è un formaggio arabo. - Ah, sì?

translation.en: Is it? I didn't, uh,
translation.it: - Il lefta è un formaggio arabo. - Ah, sì? Non gli ho chiesto il passaporto.

translation.en: -ask to see its papers. -Oh, this is a joke, right?
translation.it: Non gli ho chiesto il passaporto. Ti sembra un gioco?

translation.en: [Moshe] Giving money to our enemies.
The people who want us dead. It's hilarious.
translation.it: Gente che ci vuole morta. Divertente.

translation.en: Aharoni, you tried that one yet?
-See if it works on Eichmann. -He'll sign. We're close.
translation.it: - Vedi se funziona con Eichmann. - Firmerà, manca poco.

translation.en: We should string him up and beat a signature out of him.
[Moshe] That's what they'd do to us, but no, that'd be too easy.
translation.it: Con noi farebbero così. Ma no, troppo facile.

translation.en: Instead we have to feed him.
Relax, Moshe. It's just cheese.
translation.it: Rilassati, Moshe. È solo un formaggio.

translation.en: [Ilani] Moshe.
You're up next.
No, it's all right.
[Peter] I'll take his shift.
Why won't you sign?
I'm an Argentine citizen accused of crimes committed in Germany.
translation.it: Sono un cittadino argentino accusato di crimini commessi in Germania.

translation.en: Don't be modest.
Lithuania, Hungary, Poland. You were quite the traveler.
translation.it: Lituania, Ungheria, Polonia. Ha viaggiato un bel po'.

translation.en: I should be tried in one of those countries.
translation.it: Allora processatemi in uno di quei paesi.

translation.en: Nah.
I don't buy it.
You can't win a war if soldiers don't follow their orders.
translation.it: Non si vince una guerra se i soldati non eseguono gli ordini.

translation.en: No, that's not good enough.
-The truth will out. -What is truth? Whose truth?
translation.it: - La verità verrà fuori. - Quale verità? Di chi?

translation.en: -No one will listen to me. -I wanna listen.
Be treated like a dog. A show trial.
translation.it: Sarei trattato come un cane. Un processo-farsa.

translation.en: To pin everything on me. We held those, too, you know.
translation.it: Mi accuserebbero di tutto, anche di quel che non ho fatto.

translation.en: The preening prosecutors, the compliant judges.
translation.it: I PM spacconi, i giudici compiacenti.

translation.en: [inhales] My God. This--
[inhales] That's--
You look like shit.
Don't worry. I'm not gonna hurt you.
translation.it: Non si preoccupi, non le farò del male.

translation.en: Some of your men want to. I can smell it when they're in the room.
translation.it: Alcuni dei suoi vorrebbero. Lo sento quando entrano qui.

translation.en: -May I ask you something? -I'm not in a position to refuse.
translation.it: - Posso chiederle una cosa? - Non sono in condizioni di rifiutare.

translation.en: Is it true you called the camps "liquidation machines"?
translation.it: È vero che chiamavate i campi, "le macchine liquidatrici"?

translation.en: Mengele called you all kosher salami.
Everyone used flippant terms for dirty work.
translation.it: Tutti davano nomignoli al lavoro sporco.

translation.en: -To make us seem like animals. -We're all animals.
translation.it: Per farci sembrare animali. Siamo tutti animali.

translation.en: Fighting for scraps on the Serengeti.
translation.it: In lotta per gli avanzi nel Serengeti.

translation.en: Some of us just have bigger teeth than others.
translation.it: Alcuni hanno solo denti più aguzzi.

translation.en: You know I tried to help.
For years, I got your people out of the country.
translation.it: Per anni ho fatto uscire la sua gente dal paese.

translation.en: That was my solution. I wanted the Jews sent to Madagascar.
translation.it: Era la mia soluzione, volevo mandarvi nel Madagascar.

translation.en: Yes, dying of malaria is nicer than poisoned gas. Very thoughtful of you.
translation.it: Sì, meglio morire di malaria che con i gas. Premuroso da parte sua.

translation.en: Other countries wouldn't take you.
But that didn't stop me from trying. I negotiated.
translation.it: Ma io ci ho provato. Ho negoziato.

translation.en: With your Dr. Kasztner in Hungary.
translation.it: Col vostro Dott. Kastner, in Ungheria.

translation.en: Trucks for lives.
We tried to save Jewish lives.
translation.it: Abbiamo cercato di salvare vite ebree.

translation.en: He was a hero,
yet your people shot him in cold blood. Imagine what they'd do to me.
translation.it: e l'avete ucciso a sangue freddo. Immagini cosa farebbero a me.

translation.en: -[Peter] I didn't know about that. -Hmm.
That's why you're here, Herr Captor.
translation.it: Ecco perché è qui, Herr Sequestratore.

translation.en: To make me think Israel will listen to me.
translation.it: Per convincermi che Israele mi ascolterà.

translation.en: I just always fancied myself a barber.
translation.it: Ho sempre sognato di fare il barbiere.

translation.en: Your razor.
The brand?
It's a lot older than you, I think.
translation.it: È molto più vecchio di lei, credo.

translation.en: From Solingen, like me.
My Papa died in Israel.
translation.it: Mio padre è morto in Israele.

translation.en: One of those pesky Jews who survived.
translation.it: Uno di quelli che ha osato sopravvivere.

translation.en: So, you didn't lose anyone.
I'm glad.
I don't know what I'd have become if my family had...
translation.it: Non so cosa sarei potuto diventare se la mia famiglia fosse stata...

translation.en: [Peter] I spoke to him.
[Hanna] Why?
I was trying to get him to sign.
-Curious. -What did he say to you?
He said we're all animals.
The Jews?
No, no, everybody. Jews, Germans. All animals.
translation.it: - Gli ebrei? - No, tutti. Ebrei, tedeschi. Tutti animali.

translation.en: Bullshit.
If we're animals, he would be in pieces now.
translation.it: Fossimo stati animali, a quest'ora sarebbe a brandelli.

translation.en: -He says he was following orders. -He chose to do it.
translation.it: - Dice che ha solo eseguito ordini. - Ha scelto di farlo.

translation.en: And we are choosing to keep him alive.
translation.it: Come noi scegliamo di tenerlo in vita.

translation.en: To let him speak, but not here, not now.
translation.it: Per lasciarlo parlare, ma non qui e non ora.

translation.en: Keep your distance.
-[music playing] -[Peter] Eleven...
twelve...
thirteen.
The boys love this.
-Fourteen -I prefer the older stuff.
-Carlito Gardel. -Fifteen.
-El Zorzal Criollo. -Sixteen.
-Seventeen. -[pants] Enough.
-Enough? -Enough.
[pants] Tell me about you,
Herr Captor.
I want to know what it was that brought our lives together like this.
translation.it: Vorrei sapere come è giunto a incrociare il mio destino.

translation.en: How about this? You sign, I'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.it: Facciamo così, lei firma e io le dico ciò che vuole.

translation.en: Ah-ha. You're striking a deal.
translation.it: Ah ah, vuole fare un patto.

translation.en: I'm establishing a trading post.
But I'm fresh out of trucks before you ask.
translation.it: Ma sappia che non ho camion.

translation.en: It is... ha!
It is poor form to negotiate from a position of weakness.
translation.it: Mai negoziare da una posizione di svantaggio.

translation.en: There's an art to these things.
Always know the man who sits across the bargaining table.
translation.it: Bisogna sempre conoscere chi si ha di fronte.

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.
You sign, I'll tell you anything you wanna know.
translation.it: Firmi, e le dirò tutto quello che vuole.

translation.en: I would like to offer a counter.
Your name in return for my consideration of your terms.
translation.it: Il suo nome, e potrei considerare le sue condizioni.

translation.en: Just your name.
Is that asking so much?
-Dani. -[coughs]
[Harel] We are running out of time.
[Harel] I'll see you in an hour.
I am so close, sir. He's going to break. I know he's going to break.
translation.it: Ci sono quasi, signore. Sta per cedere. - So che cederà. - La polizia sta setacciando il quartiere.

translation.en: [Rafi] We're hearing Nazis are searching the neighborhood.
translation.it: - So che cederà. - La polizia sta setacciando il quartiere.

translation.en: I recommend we move Eichmann to another safe house.
translation.it: Meglio spostare Eichmann in un altro rifugio.

translation.en: [Harel] We can't move him. It's too risky.
Forget the damn paper. Forget him signing. Let's just get him out.
translation.it: Scordatevi la dichiarazione, la firma. Fatelo uscire e basta.

translation.en: It's more complicated that, Yaakov. El Al is the only way out.
translation.it: È più complicato, Yaakov. La EI AI è l'unico modo.

translation.en: -What do you mean it's more complicated-- -Yaakov. Let's just relax, okay?
translation.it: - Che intendi per "complicato"... - Yaakov. Rilassati, ok?

translation.en: [Eichmann] Look at me.
I do want the world to know what really happened.
translation.it: Voglio che il mondo sappia cos'è successo.

translation.en: But it needs to be fair.
People have to listen.
In Israel, they'll just want to see me suffer.
translation.it: In Israele vogliono solo vedermi soffrire.

translation.en: [Peter] No, not if they see you the way I've seen you.
translation.it: No, non se vedranno quel che ho visto io.

translation.en: Talk to them the way you talk to me.
translation.it: Gli parli come fa con me.

translation.en: You can tell your story, the real one.
translation.it: Racconti la sua storia, quella vera.

translation.en: In a country where my family cannot even come to watch me die.
translation.it: A un paese dove la mia famiglia non può neanche venire a vedermi morire.

translation.en: No, I would rather end it all.
Right now.
Please, just ask your superiors...
translation.it: La prego, chieda ai suoi superiori...

translation.en: for my family's sake. Please.
Dani's ready for him.
Hey, you're making everyone very nervous.
Talk a walk just round the block, okay?
You check the next one. I'll take a look here.
translation.it: - Controlla di fronte. Io guardo questa. - Ok.

translation.en: Hide him, quickly!
[Rafi] Go, go, go.
-Anything? -[man] No.
Peter, help!
-No wonder he hasn't broken. -[Peter] All he knows is my name.
translation.it: - Certo che non ha ceduto. - Sa solo il mio nome.

translation.en: I've just spoken to him. Is it true you give him cigarettes?
translation.it: Ci ho parlato. È vero che gli hai dato una sigaretta?

translation.en: [Peter] Yeah.
[laughs] Oh, of course, he wouldn't break.
He's getting room service here, catering to his every whim.
translation.it: Ha il servizio in camera, tutti i comfort.

translation.en: Did you think for even a second what was going to happen, huh?
translation.it: Hai riflettuto sulle conseguenze delle tue azioni?

translation.en: We're all going to rot in a cell because of you.
translation.it: Marciremo in galera per colpa tua.

translation.en: -I can get the signature. -Give me a break.
-That's bullshit! -[Hanna] Let him.
-Let him try. -[Aharoni] Bullshit.
Let him try.
[Aharoni] That's nonsense. He's compromised us all again.
translation.it: Che assurdità. Ci ha di nuovo compromessi tutti.

translation.en: Sir, I can do it.
We've got no choice.
[Harel] Get us his signature.
-L'Chaim. -L'Chaim.
-I think you should sign. -Why?
Because I believe you.
Tell them what you told me, about the orders you ignored.
translation.it: Dica loro quel che ha detto a me, degli ordini che ha ignorato.

translation.en: They'll only hear the ones I took.
translation.it: Conteranno solo quelli a cui ho obbedito.

translation.en: You and I both know I shall die in Israel.
translation.it: Sappiamo entrambi che morirò in Israele.

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Peter.
Why am I the one guilty for my country's mistakes?
translation.it: Perché sono l'unico colpevole degli errori del mio paese?

translation.en: So, you would say what you did to my people was a mistake?
translation.it: Quindi ciò che ci avete fatto è stato un errore?

translation.en: We were told that Germany,
our land of hope and possibility, was being overrun.
translation.it: la terra della speranza, stava per essere invasa.

translation.en: -If we were to survive-- -Yes, but there's a line.
translation.it: - Per sopravvivere... - Sì, ma c'è un limite.

translation.en: And you believe you people have found that line, do you? Funny.
translation.it: E crede che la sua gente sappia qual è? Suvvia.

translation.en: I've heard the rumors, a facility in the Negev Desert.
translation.it: Ho sentito di un posto nel deserto del Negev.

translation.en: Do you know a hydrogen bomb rarely asks the age of his victims?
translation.it: Sa che la bomba H raramente chiede l'età alla sue vittime?

translation.en: That's not the same and you know it.
translation.it: Non è lo stesso, e lei lo sa.

translation.en: You watch, they'll cremate my body.
I don't know. I don't know what they'll do in Israel.
translation.it: Non lo so. Non so che succederà, in Israele.

translation.en: And not everyone will give you the chance to say your peace.
translation.it: Non tutti le faranno raccontare la sua versione.

translation.en: Whom did we take from you, Peter?
Think about your boys.
If you sign, they'll know you told the truth.
translation.it: Se firma, sapranno che ha detto la verità.

translation.en: That you went to Israel with nothing to hide.
translation.it: Che è andato in Israele senza niente da nascondere.

translation.en: Whom did you lose?
-We lost six million-- -I'm asking about you.
She's beautiful.
She was more than my sister.
She was my teacher,
and parent.
My friend.
She had three beautiful children.
May I ask how she died?
We think... in the woods near Lublin.
translation.it: Pensiamo in un bosco vicino Lublin.

translation.en: -I'm afraid I don't-- -I wasn't asking.
translation.it: - Temo di non... - Non era una domanda.

translation.en: Of course.
She would have died...
protecting the little ones. I know that much.
translation.it: proteggendo i suoi piccoli. Lo so.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I am truly sorry.
May I...
May I ask her name?
-Fruma. -[whispers] Fruma.
Her name was Fruma.
I saw you... watching the trains.
translation.it: Giorni fa l'ho spiata... mentre guardava i treni.

translation.en: You were counting the wagons with your boy.
translation.it: Contava i vagoni con suo figlio.

translation.en: Just like Fruma used to do with her little boy.
translation.it: Proprio come Fruma faceva col suo.

translation.en: The only difference...
is that her boy is dead, and yours is alive.
translation.it: è che il suo è morto, e il suo no.

translation.en: Are you a family man, Peter?
Maybe one day.
It only gets harder with age. Trust me.
translation.it: Con l'età diventa più difficile, mi creda.

translation.en: You have a woman, I'd assume, so why no children?
translation.it: Presumo abbia una donna, ma perché non ha figli?

translation.en: I think you know why.
I think perhaps you worry that the future will look like the past.
translation.it: Lei forse teme che il futuro assomiglierà molto al passato.

translation.en: I hope that changes...
for your sake.
I would like to ask one last thing.
I would like to see my wife again one last time before I die.
translation.it: Rivedere mia moglie prima di morire.

translation.en: If you sign, I'll make sure you see your wife again.
translation.it: Se firma, farò in modo che accada.

translation.en: You swear it, Peter?
On Fruma?
On Fruma.
You did it. [laughs]
I'll need to call a friend to bring more pesos.
translation.it: Devo chiamare un amico per farmi portare i soldi.

translation.en: You can wait at my place. It's nearby. Follow me.
translation.it: Tu puoi aspettare a casa mia, è vicino. Seguimi.

translation.en: [Carlos] We know you work for the Jews.
translation.it: Sappiamo che lavori per gli ebrei.

translation.en: If you want us to stop, you must tell me where he is, my dear.
translation.it: Se vuoi che smettiamo, devi dirci dov'è, tesoro.

translation.en: [crying] I don't know. I don't know.
-[shouting] Stop! Stop! Stop! -[screams]
[Klaus] Stop!
My name is Klaus Eichmann.
I just want my father back.
Please.
Help.
Help me and I can make them stop.
translation.it: Mi aiuti e io li fermerò.

translation.en: [Rafi ] Let's clear the house of all personal items.
Moshe, prep the cars.
-Yaakov, get the luggage ready. -[Yaakov] Okay.
-Oh, where's Graciela? Someone call her. -[Ilani] I'm on it, boss.
translation.it: Dov'è Graciela? Chiamatela. Ci penso io, capo.

translation.en: [Rafi] Go get Eichmann ready. We leave in one hour. Let's go.
translation.it: Preparate Eichmann. Si va tra un'ora.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -[Eichmann] Time to go, is it?
translation.it: Ok. - È ora di andare, giusto? - Sì.

translation.en: I'll examine you and then I'll give you a shot to relax.
translation.it: La visiterò e le inietterò un tranquillante.

translation.en: Understood?
Sounds very peaceful.
[Hanna] Sit back.
You remind me of her.
His Fruma.
[Eichmann] I said I couldn't help, but perhaps I can.
translation.it: Le ho detto di non sapere com'è andata, ma forse non è così.

translation.en: Her story, your story,
reminds me of when I was sent east.
translation.it: mi ricorda di quando fui mandato all'est.

translation.en: General Müller asked I check on the Einsatzgruppen,
translation.it: Il generale Müller mi chiese di visitare le Einsatzgruppen, per far morale.

translation.en: the morale had dropped. They needed an authority figure...
translation.it: Il generale Müller mi chiese di visitare le Einsatzgruppen, per far morale. Serviva un'autorità per risollevarli un po'.

translation.en: to reinvigorate them.
translation.it: Serviva un'autorità per risollevarli un po'.

translation.en: And, to my mind... [clears throat]
I wondered if I might solve the issue.
translation.it: se fossi stato capace di risolvere il problema.

translation.en: Find a less chaotic manner of proceeding other than vans and bullets.
translation.it: Trovare un metodo meno caotico dei furgoni e delle pallottole.

translation.en: It was horrifying.
Five thousand Jews lined up to stand in this pit.
translation.it: Cinquemila ebrei in piedi in una fossa.

translation.en: I had to drink Schnapps to keep from fainting.
translation.it: Dovetti bere della grappa per non svenire.

translation.en: I remember a woman and her baby.
translation.it: Ricordo una donna e il suo bambino.

translation.en: She begged for the child's life.
translation.it: Lei implorò di risparmiare il figlio.

translation.en: She lifted it up
as if she might give her baby to me, as if I might save it.
translation.it: come per passarmelo, come se potessi salvarlo.

translation.en: I would, on occasion,
do such things, an old acquaintance,
people who might be of use, but this--
translation.it: gente che poteva servirmi, ma quella volta...

translation.en: [Hanna] Stop talking, please.
Then bang.
[Eichmann] The bullet that killed her goes straight through her child first.
translation.it: Il proiettile che la uccise passò prima attraverso il bambino.

translation.en: I remember wiping its brains off my jacket.
translation.it: Dovetti pulire il suo cervello dalla mia giacca.

translation.en: Do you think that's how we did it, Peter?
[Eichmann] Do you think that's how we killed Fruma?
[Eichmann] One can hope it was that quick.
That they didn't do the things some soldiers do,
translation.it: Rispetto a certe cose che facevano i soldati,

translation.en: but then we'll never know.
[Hanna] Peter, don't listen to him.
[Eichmann] They'll say my death is justice
translation.it: Diranno che la mia morte avrà reso giustizia

translation.en: for all the people you lost.
translation.it: a tutti quelli che avete perso.

translation.en: That makes my life worth six million Frumas.
translation.it: Pensi, la mia vita che equivale a quella di sei milioni di Fruma.

translation.en: How does that make you feel, knowing that she's not worth the spit in my mouth?
translation.it: Che effetto le fa sapere che lei invece non vale neanche lo sputo che ho in bocca?

translation.en: -Let go of the syringe. Peter! -Do it, for God's sake.
translation.it: - Lascia la siringa. - Fallo, per Dio!

translation.en: Go on, do it you coward. -Leave. -[Hanna] Don't.
-Make her worth something! -[Peter] Get out.
-[Hanna] Peter. -Leave.
