-Is that what you want? -[shouts] Leave right now!
Come on. Do it!
[Hanna] Rafi!
[Hanna] Get him out. He's ready.
[Rafi] Leave the cars. Out the back.
translation.it: Lasciate le macchine. Usciamo dal retro.

translation.en: [Rafi] Moshe, do your thing.
-[Moshe] Yep. -[Peter] I got him.
[Peter] Go around.
[Moshe] Come on. Come on.
[Peter] The car's too small, we're not gonna fit.
translation.it: La macchina è piccola, non c'entriamo.

translation.en: [Moshe] Go get in the other car.
-[Peter[ What about you? -[Rafi] There's no room. I'm staying.
translation.it: E tu? Non c'è posto. Io rimango.

translation.en: [Rafi] I'll find my own way home. Tell me what it was like.
-I should have-- -[Aharoni] No, no. It's all right.
translation.it: - Avrei dovuto... - No, va bene così.

translation.en: You got what we needed.
translation.it: Hai ottenuto quel che ci serviva.

translation.en: I just thought... I just need him to be there.
translation.it: Ho pensato che... dovevo esserci io.

translation.en: I know, me too.
Our slot is in 15 minutes.
You'd better hope your people hurry up.
translation.it: Spero che la sua gente si sbrighi.

translation.en: Don't worry.
-[Ilani in Spanish] Hello, friend. -[security in Spanish] Hi. Passports.
translation.it: - Ciao, amico. - Come va? I passaporti di lor signori.

translation.en: [mumbling in Spanish] Hello, sir.
[Ilani] Too much Fernet... He's a monster on the stuff.
translation.it: Troppo Fernet... se ne scola a litri.

translation.en: You have no idea.
-[officer in Spanish] All clear. -[Ilani in Spanish] Thank you.
-[officer in Spanish] Goodbye. -[Ilani in Spanish] Goodbye.
[in Spanish] This is Inspector Rega.
[Moshe] Take him up. I'll get rid of the car.
translation.it: Portatelo su, io mi libero dell'auto.

translation.en: We have to prevent them from flying. Understand?
At your service.
Radio Fuldner! They're at the airport.
[traffic controller] You are clear for landing, 25 right. Winds are two, three, four, and six.
translation.it: Siete autorizzati all'atterraggio, 25 destra, vento a 2, 3, 4 e 6.

translation.en: [controller] Three, five, five, eight, five, five. This is Buenos Aires.
translation.it: Tre, cinque, cinque, otto, cinque, cinque. Qui Buenos Aires.

translation.en: -[pilot over radio] -[controller] We have you on radar.
Quickly, strap him in.
Air traffic control. This is El Al 4XAGD. NOTAMS checked.
translation.it: Torre di controllo. Qui EI AI 4XAGD. NOTAM libero.

translation.en: Our flight path confirmed. Ready for takeoff.
[controller] El Al, slot for you in five. Confirming landing permits now.
translation.it: EI AI, slot tra cinque minuti. Controllo il permesso di atterraggio.

translation.en: Can I speak to you for a moment?
I'm sorry.
I lost it over there.
translation.it: Ho perso la calma lì dentro.

translation.en: -No. It's just about you. -You know that I love you.
translation.it: - No. - Lo sai che ti amo. Si tratta sempre di te.

translation.en: Your pain.
Your hate.
-It's a long trip. In the air we'll talk. -Okay.
translation.it: - È un viaggio lungo, parleremo in volo. - Ok.

translation.en: [Peter] What's going on?
-[co-pilot] We have a problem. -[Harel] What?
We have to stop, and I've got to refuel.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare scalo a Dakar per il rifornimento.

translation.en: We filed a landing permit this morning but they're saying they don't have it.
translation.it: Stamani ho consegnato il permesso di atterraggio, ma l'hanno perso.

translation.en: That's impossible.
[Aharoni] It can't be an accident. What do you want to do?
translation.it: Non è un caso. Cosa succede ora?

translation.en: They're sending someone to collect our copy.
translation.it: Vengono a prendere la nostra copia.

translation.en: -How long's that gonna take? -Fifteen minutes. Thirty maybe.
translation.it: - Quanto ci vorrà? - Quindici minuti. Forse trenta.

translation.en: What if one of us ran it over, would we be able to get back in time?
translation.it: E se glielo portasse uno di noi? Farebbe in tempo a tornare?

translation.en: [Harel] Can someone from your crew go?
[pilot] I am not leaving any of my crew behind.
translation.it: Nessuno della mia squadra rimane qui.

translation.en: I'll go.
Give me the permit.
-Landing permits. El Al. Who do I...? -[controller]Traffic at three o'clock.
translation.it: - Il permesso di EI AI. - Traffico a ore tre. A chi lo...

translation.en: Okay. They can go now.
Immediately, or the next slot's in 15 minutes.
translation.it: Subito, o il prossimo slot tra 15 minuti.

translation.en: -Fifteen minutes. -That gives you time to re-board.
translation.it: - Quindici minuti. - Avrebbe tempo di salire a bordo.

translation.en: Do it. Send the plane now.
translation.it: Glielo dica. Li faccia partire ora.

translation.en: [pilot] Ladies and gentlemen, we have been cleared to take off.
translation.it: Signore e signori, abbiamo ricevuto l'autorizzazione al decollo.

translation.en: What about Peter?
You know that I have Inspector Rega following behind me,
translation.it: Guardi che sta per arrivare anche l'ispettore Rega

translation.en: and when he arrives this friendly conversation is over.
translation.it: e presto questa conversazione assumerà un altro tono.

translation.en: [Klaus shouts] Let go! Let go! My father is on that plane!
translation.it: Lasciatemi! Lasciatemi! Mio padre è su quell'aereo!

translation.en: [Klaus] Let go!
[Klaus shouts] Let go!
[Ben-Gurion] Ladies and gentlemen of the Knesset,
a short time ago, the most notorious Nazi war criminal,
translation.it: pochi giorni fa, il noto criminale di guerra nazista,

translation.en: Adolf Eichmann, responsible with the Nazi leaders
translation.it: Adolf Eichmann, responsabile insieme ad altri gerarchi

translation.en: for the extermination of six million of the Jews of Europe,
translation.it: del genocidio di sei milioni di ebrei europei,

translation.en: has been discovered and apprehended.
[Ben Gurion] Adolf Eichmann is already under arrest in Israel.
translation.it: Adolf Eichmann è già agli arresti in Israele,

translation.en: He will shortly be placed on trial in Jerusalem
translation.it: e presto verrà processato a Gerusalemme

translation.en: under the terms of the law for the trial of Nazis and their helpers.
translation.it: secondo le leggi emanate per processare i nazisti e i loro collaboratori.

translation.en: [Peter] All fixed.
[Mrs. Malkin] Take her with you.
[officer] Ticket.
Identification. Very nice.
Join the back of the line.
-[officer] Tickets. -[Aharoni] Peter.
[Peter] It's quite a line.
[Aharoni] It's all right. I'll help you get in.
[man] I stand here before you, judges of Israel,
translation.it: Sono qui davanti a voi, giudici di Israele,

translation.en: to lead the prosecution of Adolf Eichmann,
translation.it: per condurre l'accusa contro Adolf Eichmann,

translation.en: but I am not standing alone.
With me are six million accusers.
translation.it: Con me ci sono altri sei milioni di accusatori.

translation.en: But they cannot rise to their feet, and point toward him who sits in the dock
translation.it: Che non possono alzarsi e puntare l'indice verso l'imputato

translation.en: and cry out, j'accuse!
[man] For their ashes
are piled up on the hills of Auschwitz and in the fields of Treblinka.
translation.it: sono accumulate sulle colline di Auschwitz e nei campi di Treblinka.

translation.en: Their blood cries out,
but their voice is not heard.
translation.it: ma non possiamo sentire la loro voce.

translation.en: [man] Therefore, today I will be their spokesman.
translation.it: Per questo, oggi sarò il loro portavoce.

translation.en: And in their name, I will unfold the awesome indictment.
translation.it: E in loro nome, presenterò prove schiaccianti.

translation.en: The history of the Jewish people is steeped in suffering and tears.
translation.it: La storia del popolo d'Israele è immersa nella sofferenza e nelle lacrime.

translation.en: Yet never, down the entire blood-stained road traveled by this people,
translation.it: Tuttavia, mai la sanguinosa strada percorsa da questo popolo,

translation.en: [voice fading off] never since the first...
[Rafi] Hey.
They say the only thing Eichmann will talk about
translation.it: Dicono che a Eichmann interessi solo

translation.en: is what the cover of his autobiography's gonna look like.
-You chosen yours yet? -[Rafi] No.
You think Miriam would let me make that decision? She barely lets me choose breakfast.
translation.it: Pensi che Miriam me lo lascerebbe fare? A malapena scelgo il latte.

translation.en: You gonna go back in?
I don't know.
[Rafi] You don't have to.
Fruma won't hate you for letting go.
You got him. Remember that.
-Yeah. It wasn't just me, Raf. -[Rafi] Ah.
translation.it: Già. Ma non ero solo, Raf.

translation.en: It doesn't matter anyway. No one's gonna know it was us.
translation.it: Non importa, nessuno saprà che siamo stati noi.

translation.en: History only remembers the tall people.
translation.it: La storia ricorda solo quelli alti.

translation.en: -What about Napoleon? -[Rafi] Who?
